p: The Kruskal-Wallis rank-sum test was used to compare statistical differences between multiple groups. Wilcoxon rank-sum test was used to perform statistical analysis for comparison between two groups. P <0.05 was considered statistically significant. Subsequently, both univariate and multivariate Cox proportional hazards regression analyses of the hub genes and other clinical factors for the overall survival (OS) time were performed in the TCGA cohort.
